cmsc420.meeshquest.part1
Class PRQuadTree

java.lang.Object
  cmsc420.meeshquest.part1.PRQuadTree

public class PRQuadTree
extends java.lang.Object

A PR Quadtree that maps City objects into a given region; it also provides a couple of operations concerning the tree structure.

Constructor Summary
PRQuadTree(double height, double width)
          Default constructor, set the height and width of the supported region.

Constructor Detail

PRQuadTree

public PRQuadTree(double height,
                  double width)
Default constructor, set the height and width of the supported region. The root is null, indicating empty tree.

Parameters:
height - (0,height) is the supported x coordinate value scale
width - (0,width) is the supported y coordinate value scale

findMagicLeafNode

public cmsc420.meeshquest.part1.PRQuadTree.LeafNode findMagicLeafNode(cmsc420.meeshquest.part1.PRQuadTree.InNode root,
                                                                      double x,
                                                                      double y)
It returns the LeafNode that the given coordinate should be in, no matter it is occupied by another city or not.

The user should check whether (x,y) is out of the tree's boundary.

Parameters:
root - the root of subtree that to start with
x -
y -
Returns:
a LeafNode object
